name: Those People Scare Me
description:
A top-down shooter, where you are an alien trying to  survive curious earthlings.

They move faster when you're not moving. So DON'T STOP!

There are guns hidden on the level. 

Some parts of environment are destructible. 

Shoot responsibly - there are no ammo packs. You have to find a new gun.

However, in trouble use "R" to reload the gun you have.
